trans-unit.source: Specifies the available verbosity levels of a <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Utilities.Logger"></xref>.
The descriptions of verbosity levels are only guidelines to how a typical logger (including the default [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] console logger) logs build events.
Loggers are free to interpret verbosity levels in any way they want.

Detailed verbosity, which displays errors, warnings, messages with <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.MessageImportance"></xref> values of <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.MessageImportance.High"></xref> or <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.MessageImportance.Normal"></xref>, all status events, and a build summary.
Diagnostic verbosity, which displays all errors, warnings, messages, status events, and a build summary.

Minimal verbosity, which displays errors, warnings, messages with <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.MessageImportance"></xref> values of <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.MessageImportance.High"></xref>, and a build summary.

Normal verbosity, which displays errors, warnings, messages with <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.MessageImportance"></xref> values of <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.MessageImportance.High"></xref>, some status events, and a build summary.
Quiet verbosity, which displays a build summary.
